ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Does anyone have this odd thing in there bills for EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: I dun have this thingy, I just checked my card bill, all I have is SOE*station Everquest ...
ygData.messageBody:
I dun have this thingy, I just checked my card bill, all I have is "SOE*station Everquest"...

On Tuesday, 09 May, 2000 2:50 AM, Chen Lizhi [SMTP:polarcoordinates@...] wrote:
> I have been having this odd entry in my bills ever since I subscribe to EQ.
> It is called Butterfly to Boom, not sure what it is, but it's been billing
> me ever since I started playing EQ. It's the same price as EQ, US$9.98 so I
> assumed earlier it's just the company handling the subscribtion for EQ, but
> when I stopped subscribtion for 3 months during BMT, I am still getting
> billed for it. Anyone knows if this entry is part of the subscribtion for
> EQ?
